messages.message: Has anyone seen output like this in go services? I seem to be getting the error both when trying to `runlocal` or when doing `build-docker`. Just realized I’m running thrift 0.14 instead of 0.13, and I think I’ve been doing that for a few months now without issues
Not sure why this didn’t show up until now, but downgrading thrift to 0.13 did the trick
we require thrift 0.13.0, no one’s actually tested 0.14.0 (until you now I guess). :stuck_out_tongue:
